menu.name: Fried Rice
menu.description: A delicious and savory dish made with stir-fried rice, mixed vegetables, and your choice of protein. Our secret blend of spices gives it a spicy kick that will tantalize your taste buds.

menu.name: Yakisoba
menu.description: Yakisoba is a Japanese stir-fried noodle dish loaded with fresh vegetables and your choice of meat or tofu. It's a savory and satisfying meal that's not too spicy.

menu.name: Burger
menu.description: Our classic burger is a juicy masterpiece. It features a flame-grilled beef patty, fresh lettuce, tomato, onion, and a special sauce, all served on a toasted sesame seed bun.

menu.name: Salad
menu.description: Our garden-fresh salad is a light and healthy choice. It's a colorful mix of crisp lettuce, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, carrots, and your choice of dressing.

menu.name: Shishito Pepper
menu.description: Shishito peppers are a delightful appetizer with a mild smoky flavor. Served blistered and seasoned with our special spicy seasoning, they're perfect for those who enjoy a little heat.
